channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-5868] Joined container does not have provision status sometimes
item.description:
When you join a container into fabric, it does not have provision status sometimes. It is probably related to ENTESB-5206 , as it can't connect to ZK initially (see "Unable to set provisioning result"):

after fabric:join:

It seems the connection is re-established after the initial failure, but the provision status is not set again. This can break automation of creating clusters with fabric:join (as we wait for the success provision status).

JBossFuse:karaf@root> container-list
 
[id]   [version]  [type]  [connected]  [profiles]              [provision status]
 
root*  1.0        karaf   yes          fabric                  success           
                                       fabric-ensemble-0000-1                    
                                       jboss-fuse-full                           
xx     1.0        karaf   yes          fabric

This can be worked around by restarting the joined container after joining into the fabric:

JBossFuse:karaf@root> container-list
 
[id]   [version]  [type]  [connected]  [profiles]              [provision status]
 
root*  1.0        karaf   yes          fabric                  success           
                                       fabric-ensemble-0000-1                    
                                       jboss-fuse-full                           
xx     1.0        karaf   yes          fabric                  success
item.summary: Joined container does not have provision status sometimes

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

customfieldvalues.customfieldvalue:
2 containers: "root", "xx"
"root":

  • uncomment default admin user

"xx":

  • uncomment default admin user
  • change karaf.name in etc/system.properties

"root"

  • fabric:create

"xx"

  • fabric:join --zookeeper-password admin <root_ip>:2181
